synopsis: Introverted superfan Arnold undergoes plastic surgery to look like his pop idol Austin Kelsey (Astron-6`s Conor Sweeney). It does not go well, but it does go hilariously, and with an infectious earworm of a soundtrack to bootâ€¦ or since it's Canadian should I say "aboot" (*programmer pelted with tomatoes*).
title: Imitations
